GWmodel R package

Dr. Paul Harris, Rothamsted research, presenting Modelling Spatial Heterogeneity with Geographically Weighted Models.

In GWmodel, we introduce techniques from a particular branch of spatial statistics,termed geographically-weighted (GW) models.
GW models suit situations when data are not described well by some global model, but where there are spatial regions where a suitably localised calibration provides a better description.
GWmodel includes functions to calibrate GW summary statistics, GW principal components analysis, GW discriminant analysis and various forms of GW regression; some of which are provided in basic and robust (outlier resistant) forms.

Author : Binbin Lu, Paul Harris, Martin Charlton, Chris Brunsdon, Tomoki Nakaya, Isabella Gollini.]

  • Modelling Spatial Heterogeneity with Geographically Weighted Models Dr. Paul Harris
  • GW model package R documentation
  • Gollini et al. 2015 Journal of Statistical Software - bibliographic reference.
